attributes.additional_details: I'm a learner driver around the roads of Nottinghamshire. The road markings are extremely worn in way too many areas. Making it hard for people new to the roads to identify lanes, directions, junctions and no overtaking markings etc. These need replacing as they're extremely dangerous for us unfamiliar with the roads. I'd like to give examples however this problem occurs almost everywhere I have been. I'd appreciate if this was something that  could be arranged.
attributes.background: A Re-paint of the road markings around Nottinghamshire. As a new driver on the roads, It's incredibly difficult to read a lot of the signs on the ground as they're all faded away. It's making learning unnecessarily difficult and even potentially dangerous.

rejection.details:
You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council directly. Find out how to petition your council here: https://www.nottinghamshire.gov.uk/council-and-democracy/get-involved/petitions
